\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 53340}

\subsection*{Euphoria That Doesn't Just Last a Few Hours}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Count Orlok}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 10 mg & oral & Methadone & pill / tablet\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 180.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
Having tried just about every opiate I could ever get my hands on I'd always wanted to experience methadone. I chewed a 10 mg tablet and waited for maybe an hour and a half to get high. I think 10 mgs is a good starting dose for someone that has no opiate tolerance. 



12 hours later I still have a buzz. I can't see how this isn't a more prevalent street drug.

\end{document}
